section.title: Past simple negative
section.sectiontitle: In the Past simple negative, we use I/you/he/she/it/we/they + didn't (did not) + verb.
section.text1a: She didn't get up late last Saturday.
section.text2a: They didn't go out at the weekend.
section.sectiontitle2: Remember – you don't use did in the Past simple negative with was and were.
section.text3: I was at the cinema last night.
section.text3a: I wasn't at the cinema last night.
